section:
You call on the gods to bear witness to this travesty of natural law: that a ghost should arise at once from the corpse of its former self and commence to wreak summary justice. The normal protocol allows for hauntings, nightmares and curses, but not this kind of brashness. Your prayer is that the gods will intervene to set matters aright.
Make a SANCTITY roll at a Difficulty of 13 .
